io.github.trulyfree.modular.action

Interface ModifiableActionGroup<T extends Action>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of Action supported by this ActionGroup.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ActionGroup<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionHandler<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundPrioritizedActionHandler, GeneralizedActionHandler, PrioritizedActionHandler

    public interface ModifiableActionGroup<T extends Action>
extends ActionGroup<T>
    ModifiableActionGroup interface. Groups of Events which occur with relevancy to each other and may alter in count should be packaged together in a ModifiableActionGroup. Depending on the usage of EventHandlers, it may be efficient to use an implementation shich also implements "Action", by which the "enact" method loops throughout the Events contained within this Action group and enacts them all. Such a method for ModifiableEventGroups is highly suggested to be created with the "synchronous" keyword.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

      • Methods inherited from interface io.github.trulyfree.modular.action.ActionGroup

        enactAll, enactAllOfType, enactNextEvent, getActions, size

    • Method Detail

      • addEvent

        boolean addEvent(T event)
        Method to be called in order to add an Action to this ActionGroup. Implementations which extend existing List implementations should find this method to be a single call.
        Parameters:
        event - The Action to add to the ActionGroup.
        Returns:
        success A boolean representing the success of the add operation. Note that if a throwable is thrown by this method, it should be caught and the method return false.

      • removeEvent

        boolean removeEvent(T event)
        Method to be called in order to remove an Action from this ActionGroup. Implementations which extend existing List implementations should find this method to be very simple to implement.
        Parameters:
        event - The Action to remove from the ActionGroup.
        Returns:
        removed The Action removed by this operation.

      • removeEventByType

        default Collection<T> removeEventByType(Class<? extends Action> type)
        Method to be called in order to remove Events of a specific type from this ActionGroup. A suggested implementation has been provided, but implementations may differ on the approach chosen.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of Action to remove. Note that this should respect polymorphism.
        Returns:
        removed The Action(s) removed by this operation. If no events are removed, this should return an empty collection of Events.

      • clear

        default void clear()
        Method to be called in order to remove all Events from this ActionGroup. A suggested implementation has been provided. Implementations may differ according to need.
